mapper.sql:
a.id AS "id", a.inspect_code AS "sicmedInspect.id", a.price AS "price", a.price_cutoff_date AS "priceCutoffDate", a.price_insert_date AS "priceInsertDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag",
b.inspect_name AS "sicmedInspect.inspectName"
LEFT JOIN sicmed_inspect b ON b.id = a.inspect_code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sicmed_inspect_price( id, inspect_code, price, price_cutoff_date, price_insert_date, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{sicmedInspect.id}, #{price}, #{priceCutoffDate}, #{priceInsertDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sicmed_inspect_price SET inspect_code = #{sicmedInspect.id}, price = #{price}, price_cutoff_date = #{priceCutoffDate}, price_insert_date = #{priceInsertDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, del_flag = #{delFlag} WHERE id = #{id}
